metadata.title: CVE-2022-38533 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In GNU Binutils before 2.40, there is a heap-buffer-overflow in the errorfunction bfd_getl32 when called from the strip_main function in strip-newvia a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38533` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.8
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.8
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.8
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.8

criterions.comment: binutils package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.8').
